data.comment: The match is underway in Sheffield.
Paul Tierney signals a Sheffield throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 1, Sheffield to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Leeds needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Leeds at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Sheffield.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 4, Leeds's Luke Ayling is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
In Sheffield Sheffield attack through John Lundstram. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Kalvin Phillips is booked for the away team.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
In the minute 11, Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Sheffield.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Sheffield.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 16, Paul Tierney awards Sheffield a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Sheffield to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
In the minute 23, Sheffield's Chris Basham has run offside.
Important block from the Leeds defence as John Lundstram fires in a strike for Sheffield.
Throw-in for Leeds at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 24, Sheffield have a goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds.
Leeds attack but Patrick Bamford's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 26, Paul Tierney awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stuart Dallas (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Leeds.
In Sheffield, Jack Robinson (Sheffield) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Leeds at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 29, Sheffield's John Lundstram gets in a shot on goal at Bramall Lane. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Sheffield's Jack Robinson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leeds surge into the attack at Bramall Lane but Patrick Bamfordâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 31, Sheffield have a goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a Sheffield throw-in in Leeds's half.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 34, Free kick in a good position for Leeds!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
Sheffield drive upfield and Oliver Burke gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
In the minute 35, Sheffield are pushing forward but David McGoldrick's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Stuart Dallas for Leeds drives towards goal at Bramall Lane. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 38, Liam Cooper (Leeds) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Paul Tierney awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 41, Sheffield drives forward and George Baldock gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Ethan Ampadu (Sheffield) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Leeds at Bramall Lane.
Free kick Leeds.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Oliver Burke (Sheffield) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Leeds's area.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In the minute 45, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Bramall Lane.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Paul Tierney signals a Leeds throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Marcelo Bielsa (Leeds) is making a first substitution, with Rodrigo Moreno replacing Tyler Roberts.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In Sheffield Leeds drive forward through Helder Costa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, David McGoldrick for Sheffield is whistled offside.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick Leeds.
Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 55, Mateusz Klich gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leeds.
Patrick Bamford of Leeds smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 57, Leeds needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 58, Leeds to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
John Lundstram (Sheffield) gets a yellow card.
Sheffield's Enda Stevens gets in a shot on goal at Bramall Lane. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 60, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Dallas for Leeds drives towards goal at Bramall Lane. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Luke Ayling of Leeds gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Paul Tierney signals a Sheffield throw-in in Leeds's half.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 64, Oliver Norwood is replacing John Lundstram for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Rodrigo Moreno (Leeds) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 66, Sheffield have a goal kick.
Marcelo Bielsa is making the team's second substitution at Bramall Lane with Ian Poveda replacing Helder Costa.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Leeds at Bramall Lane.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
George Baldock (Sheffield) has received a yellow card from Paul Tierney.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Sheffield's Ben Osborn gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Leeds push forward at Bramall Lane and Rodrigo Moreno gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sheffield defence.
In the minute 70, Attention is being given to Sheffieldâ€™s Ethan Ampadu and play has been suspended briefly.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Ethan Ampadu for Sheffield is back on the field again.
In the minute 73, Leeds pushes forward through Rodrigo Moreno, whose finish on goal is saved.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team replace Oliver Burke with Billy Sharp.
In the minute 74, Oliver McBurnie is replacing David McGoldrick for the home team.
Ian Poveda (Leeds) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 76, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Ian Poveda gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leeds.
In the minute 79, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Patrick Bamford for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 81, Sheffield drive upfield and George Baldock gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Jack Robinson for Sheffield gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Paul Tierney awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Paul Tierney waits before resuming play because Illan Meslier for Leeds is still down.
Illan Meslier is back on the pitch.
Leeds's Stuart Dallas is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Sheffield drives forward and Billy Sharp gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Patrick Bamford heads in to make it 0-1 at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 88, Jack Harrison with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Sheffield. The final score is 0-1.
The away team have replaced Rodrigo Moreno with Ezgjan Alioski. This is the third substitution made today by Marcelo Bielsa.
